item.title: Why Google Needed a Graph Serving System
item.description: This post made it to #3 on HackerNews front page. Do engage in discussion there and show us love by giving us a GitHub star. When I introduce myself and explain what we are building at Dgraph Labs, I am typically asked if I worked at Facebook, or if what I’m building is inspired by Facebook. A lot of people know about the efforts at Facebook to serve their social graph, because they have published multiple articles about the graph infrastructure they put together.
